ads_settings.question: Allow the ad network to collect information to personalize ads?

character_description.crocco:
Plastic and hulking crocodile. Loves to growl and gnaw.

Abilities:
- Eating knives while jumping;
- Throwing away knives when receiving damage.
character_description.froggy:
A toy frog that lost an eye. For some reason, Carolina Voitekhovna, the mother-in-law of King Froggold II, doesn’t like him.

Abilities:
- Double jump;
- Rage gain from taking damage.
character_description.golden_froggy:
Froggy's frightening image made by someone's fear.

Abilities:
- Reduced gravity;
- Temporary invincibility after taking damage.
character_description.kitty:
Homemade cat-shaped slipper. She always wears a New Year's hat and is fond of butterflies.

Abilities:
- Deflection of knives by rotation;
- Lying position.

gamejolt.text: Sign in to Game Jolt to earn achievements and submit highscores.

how_to_play.text_1: Control your character using arrows or WASD. Walk and jump.
how_to_play.text_1_mobile: Control your character using arrows. Walk and jump.
how_to_play.text_2: Beware of knives. Jump over them or go under them. Don't hit the tip of the knife!
how_to_play.text_3: Get points for successfully dodging knives.
how_to_play.text_5: Increase your score multiplier by biting Carolina!
how_to_play.text_6: Bigger multiplier - more points and damage stacking up.
how_to_play.text_7: The multiplier drops down when taking damage.
how_to_play.text_8: If your health reaches zero, you will lose.

settings.functional_keys:
F11 - Toggle fullscreen mode
F1 - Hide/Show HUD
R - Restart

shop.coming_soon: Await hats and outfits in version 3.0!
shop.how_to_get_free_coins: Watch the video and get 100 coins.
